scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.precommit: cd backend && npm run test && npm run lint
scripts.codegen:full: curl http://localhost:3000/docs-json > frontend/src/api/swagger.json && cd frontend && npm run codegen
